name: Cornflower Corbin
description: Infinite play-ability in endurance mode, or play story mode. An underwater shoot 'em up, that is family friendly and a little campy, featuring a whale (Corbin) with a laser strapped to it's back. You'll also see sharks with lasers, turtles with rockets, and much much more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: SM3 512MB VRAM Storage: 900 MB available space Additional Notes: Two (2) Controllers require for coop games
